purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers for the 44th International Conference on Conceptual Modeling (ER 2025), scheduled for October 20-23, 2025, in Poitiers, France. It invites contributions on the theme of 'Building Trust Through Conceptual Modeling' and outlines important submission deadlines and guidelines for authors. The conference aims to discuss the role of conceptual modeling in creating trustworthy and transparent systems, especially in the context of emerging technologies.
